unnormalised: **Home Loan Bonanza This Festive Season? Maybe!**
normalised: Home Loan Bonanza This Festive Season? Maybe!

unnormalised: Real Estate is buzzing, folks! And guess what? Banks are practically throwing home loan schemes at you this Onam season. HDFC, SBI, and ICICI Bank are all battling it out, trying to lure you in with crazy low interest rates – we're talking starting at around 6.8% p.a.!
normalised: Real Estate is buzzing, folks! And guess what? Banks are practically throwing home loan schemes at you this Onam season. H D F C, S B I, and I C I C I Bank are all battling it out, trying to lure you in with crazy low interest rates – we're talking starting at around six point eight percent per annum!

unnormalised: Think of it: You, finally in your own 2BHK in Powai, sipping chai on the balcony. Sounds good, right?
normalised: Think of it: You, finally in your own two B H K in Powai, sipping chai on the balcony. Sounds good, right?

unnormalised: But hold your horses, check all the fine print! Processing fees, eligibility criteria… it's all a bit of a biryani – a delicious one, but with a lot of ingredients to consider.
normalised: But hold your horses, check all the fine print! Processing fees, eligibility criteria… it's all a bit of a biryani – a delicious one, but with a lot of ingredients to consider.

unnormalised: Ramesh Uncle down the street already snagged a deal with Axis Bank, apparently saving a cool Rs. 50,000 in interest over the loan tenure.
normalised: Ramesh Uncle down the street already snagged a deal with Axis Bank, apparently saving a cool rupee fifty thousand in interest over the loan tenure.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that these rates might even drop further, especially if you're buying property in tier-2 cities like Coimbatore or Lucknow. Something to consider if Mumbai's prices are giving you a headache!
normalised: Word on the street is that these rates might even drop further, especially if you're buying property in tier-two cities like Coimbatore or Lucknow. Something to consider if Mumbai's prices are giving you a headache!

unnormalised: Do your homework, compare offers, and who knows? This Onam, you might be celebrating in your new home, thanks to these sweet home loan schemes!
normalised: Do your homework, compare offers, and who knows? This Onam, you might be celebrating in your new home, thanks to these sweet home loan schemes!
